attributes.action: Ban the retail sale of consumer fireworks to the public.
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks cause injury, distress to animals and vulnerable people, and damage to the environment. Professional displays provide a safe, controlled way to celebrate without these risks.
attributes.background: Restrict their use to licensed professionally managed public displays.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
